item.title: Profile
item.description: My name is RÃ©mi Gillig, I am a video game Graphics programmer. I like C++, C# and everything rendering related. Putting stuff on the screen and getting the best our of the talented art teams is so satisfying! I like to follow the advances in this area through SIGGRAPH and GDC talks, lectures and research papers. I’m currently working at Firesprite Ltd. (UK) as a Lead Software Engineer. Whatever projects appear on this blog are NOT affiliated with my current employer.
